data.question: What is the empirical formula of MUV-1-Cl(Co)?
At what temperature were the X-ray data for MUV-1-H(Co) collected?
What is the crystal system of MUV-8-Cl(Fe)?
What method was used for the synthesis of MUV-1-Cl(Co)?
data.answer: Cobaltocene and benzimidazole were combined and heated at 150 °C for 4 days.

data.question: What is the space group of MUV-1-Cl(Mn)?
How was the phase purity of MUV-1-Cl(Zn) established?
Is the magnetic coupling in MUV-1-Cl(Fe) antiferromagnetic?
Was ferrocene used in the synthesis of MUV-8-CH3(Fe)?
Does the crystal structure of MUV-8-Cl(Fe) contain iron centers in a tetrahedral environment?
Was thermal gravimetric analysis used to determine the thermal stability of MUV-1-H(Co)?
What technique was used to measure the thickness of the flakes for two-dimensional layers?
What was the heating rate during the thermal gravimetric analysis of MUV-1-Cl(Co)?
What is the role of benzimidazole in the synthesis of MUV-1-Cl(Co)?
data.answer: It is combined with cobaltocene as a precursor.

data.question: Is the crystal structure of MUV-1-H(Co) monoclinic?
Was Raman spectroscopy used to assess the nature of mechanically exfoliated thin-layers?
What is the crystal system of MUV-1-H(Co)?
What method was used to determine the magnetic properties of MUV-1-Cl(Mn)?
What is the empirical formula of MUV-8-Cl(Fe)?
Does the synthesis of MUV-8-CH3(Fe) involve heating at 250 °C?
What is the role of ferrocene in the synthesis of MUV-8-Cl(Fe)?
data.answer: It is combined with 5,6-dichlorobenzimidazole as a precursor.
